00010 def generate(env):
00011         from SCons.Options import Options
00012 
00013         optionfile = env['CACHEDIR']+'/libkdegames.cache.py'
00014 
00015         opts = Options(optionfile)
00016         opts.AddOptions(
00017                 ( 'LIBKDEGAMESINCLUDEPATH', 'path to libkdegames headers' ),
00018                 ( 'LIBKDEGAMESLIBPATH', 'path to libkdegames library' ),
00019                 ( 'ALREADY_CONFIGURED', 'configuration succeeded' )
00020         )
00021         opts.Update(env)
00022 
00023         if 'configure' in env['TARGS'] or not env.has_key('ALREADY_CONFIGURED'):
00024                 print "Checking for libkdegames          : ",
00025 
00026                 if not env.has_key('LIBKDEGAMESINCLUDEPATH') or \
00027                    not os.path.isfile( env['LIBKDEGAMESINCLUDEPATH'] + "/kstdgameaction.h" ):
00028                         env['LIBKDEGAMESINCLUDEPATH'] = env['KDEINCLUDEPATH']
00029                         if not os.path.isfile( env['LIBKDEGAMESINCLUDEPATH'] + "/kstdgameaction.h" ):
00030                                 print RED+"could not find headers!"+NORMAL
00031                                 import sys
00032                                 sys.exit( 1 )
00033 
00034                 if not env.has_key('LIBKDEGAMESLIBPATH') or \
00035                    not os.path.isfile( env['LIBKDEGAMESLIBPATH'] + "/libkdegames.so" ):
00036                         env['LIBKDEGAMESLIBPATH'] = env['KDELIBPATH']
00037                         if not os.path.isfile( env['LIBKDEGAMESLIBPATH'] + "/libkdegames.so" ):
00038                                 print RED+"could not find library!"+NORMAL
00039                                 import sys
00040                                 sys.exit( 1 )
00041 
00042                 env['ALREADY_CONFIGURED'] = 1
00043 
00044                 opts.Save(optionfile, env)
00045
